fields.name: CITI Data or Specimens Only Research
fields.description:
The CITI Data or Specimens only course covers important aspects of research with human participant data. Modules covered include:

  • Defining Research with Human Subjects
  • Privacy and Confidentiality
  • Assessing Risk
  • Research with Children
  • International Research
  • History and Ethical Principles
  • Regulations and Process
  • SBR Methodologies in Biomedical Research
  • Genetics Research
  • Records-Based Research
  • Populations in Research Requiring Additional Considerations and/or Protections
  • HIPAA and Human Subjects Research
  • Conflicts of Interest in Research Involving Human Subjects

fields.content: Is the CITI Completion Report attached?
Is the report up to date (i.e. not expired)?
Are all of the required modules complete?
Has the "Research and HIPAA Privacy Protections" module been completed?
Does the name on the training form match the name listed in the user profile?
